description: API contract for adding a new task to the in-memory store

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: The required title of the task

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: The optional description of the task

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

task_id.description: The unique ID of the created task (if successful)

rules: must be a non-empty string after whitespace is trimmed

business_rules: Each task must have a unique ID that increments automatically
New tasks are created with completed=False by default
The title must be trimmed of leading/trailing whitespace before validation
